song_lyrics: Re sneh vash thaī Shāmaḷiyo, kahe chhe Prāṇjīvan pātaḷiyo... Re sneh° ṭek
Re rachanā brahmānḍunī rachāye, re saguṇ swarūp Akṣhar thāye;
Jene ved jay jaykārī gāye... Re sneh° 1
Re Mahā Viṣhṇu ādi anant koṭī, re dharī deh mahākṛuti moṭī;
Rahe Akṣhar rommāhī loṭī... Re sneh° 2
Re emā rahe sahu lay pāmī, re Akṣhar anant kaḷā(nā) swāmī;
Kā’ve pote nirguṇ bahu nāmī... Re sneh° 3
Re jem Akṣharmā hu rahu chhu, re te samajāvīne kahu chhu;
Suṇo ek draṣhṭānt dau chhu... Re sneh° 4
Re shabda bole nabhmā rahīne, re ek anek rūpe thaīne;
Samajāve vā’lo Premsakhīno kahīne... Re sneh° 5
title: Re sneh vash thaī Shāmaḷiyo

metadata.kirtan_info:
1-450: Sadguru Premanand Swami

Category: Updeshna Pad
